title: IELTS Regular Course (Online)
description: The IELTS course puts equal weight on reading writing, listening, speaking and test taking strategies. The course also covers sub skills such as academic vocabulary, academic style and study skills each day. ... If the student places at Level 4 they are eligible for IELTS.

title: IELTS With Foundation (Online)
description: This course is designed for intermediate English students who are aiming for an IELTS score of 6.0 or higher to help gain access to university or college, or to improve employment prospects - in Australia, or in other English-speaking countries throughout the world.

title: IELTS Reading Course (Online)
description: This course focuses on the reading test. You’ll explore the format of the test and the kinds of text you need to read, and develop learning strategies to help you tackle the different task types, from multiple choice to true, false, and not given.

title: IELTS Crash Course (Offline)
description: It includes 3 weeks of intensive IELTS training which focuses on the core of skills from Reading, Writing, Listening and Speaking elements. Students will be acquainted with the necessary skills and techniques to excel in IELTS examinations.

title: IELTS Life Skills (Online)
description: This course is designed for beginner to upper-intermediate students. It offers a great foundation if you’re looking to progress to outcome-focused courses such as IELTS, Cambridge and Academic English. It's your great oppurtunity. Don't Miss it

title: Mock Test (Offline)
description: We strongly advise test takers to practice IELTS. By taking our free practice tests, you will get to know the test format, experience the types of tasks you will be asked to undertake, test yourself and review your answers and compare them with model answers.

title: Online Support 24/7
description: To make students happy, you need conversational experiences—connected communication across any channel.
